\\section{Sample Document}

This is a \\textbf{bold} and \\textit{italic} paragraph with \\underline{underline} and a \\href{https://example.com}{link}.

\\begin{quote}
A quoted line.
\\end{quote}

\\begin{itemize}
\\item First item
\\item Second item
\\begin{enumerate}
\\item Nested one
\\item Nested two
\\end{enumerate}
\\end{itemize}

\\begin{verbatim}
const code = "block";
\\end{verbatim}

Inline \\texttt{code} and a line break \\newline here.

\\begin{tabular}{lcr}
Alpha & Beta & Gamma \\
Delta & Epsilon & Zeta \\
\\end{tabular}

\\hrule
